forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Localized flooding is expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Localized flooding is expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High around 55F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
